creator.description:
Ceaseless watcher, turn your endless gaze upon this wretched thing. 

Not affiliated with @skywatch.bsky.social | Independent Labeling Service

locales.description: Applied to posts which contain well-known English-language slurs disparaging people based on race, ethnicity, religion, nationality, sexual orientation, or gender.
locales.name: Slur

locales.description: Label for posts and accounts which spam users with off-topic replies, engage in troll like behavior, or which engage in concern trolling. This label is also applied to accounts whose bio contains several terms that are frequently used by troll accounts and may accidentally catch some reclaiming uses: please appeal any errors by tapping the label.
locales.name: Troll

locales.description: Applied to posts which contain a link to sites known to be sources of disinformation and misinformation. Includes: americanactionnews.com, thepoliticalinsider.com, americadaily.com, bles.com, dkn.tv, theepochtimes.(com, de, fr, gr), genuinenewspaper.com, tierrapura.org, truthandtradition.news, visiontimes.com, bigleaguepolitics.com, cnsnews.com, mrctv.org, newsbusters.org, flvoicenews.com, breitbart.com, americasvoice.news, gnews.org, dailycaller.com, thefederalist.com, lewrockwell.com, loomered.com, newsmax.com, oann.com, patriotpost.us, prageru.com, truthfeed.com, thegatewaypundit.com, westernjournal.com, townhall.com, zerohedge.com, dailywire.com, washingtontimes.com, texasscorecard.com
locales.name: Fringe Media & Disinfo

locales.description: You know what this is for.
locales.name: Alf

locales.description: Applied to posts which contain a link to sites which are considered alt-tech, such as givesendgo.com or rumble.com. Read more about alt-tech here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alt-tech
locales.name: Alt-tech

locales.description: This is a label for people who want a badge that says "Beans" on their profile.
locales.name: Beans

locales.description: This user has been here since before the media tab (August 2023). This label is not a label of honor‚Äîno highly esteemed deed is commemorated here.
locales.name: Bluesky Elder

locales.description: This post links to sources known to be part of pro-Kremlin and pro-Assad disinformation networks. More detail available here: https://bsky.app/profile/skywatch.blue/post/3l5uvdirylt2e
locales.name: Disinformation Network

locales.description: Username, handle, and / or description which includes reference to Elon Musk.
locales.name: Elon Musk

locales.description: Applied to posts which contain a link to sites commonly used for fundraising or requesting money, such as gofundme or ko-fi. Never applied to profiles or accounts.
locales.name: Fundraising Link

locales.description: Username and / or description which includes ‚ò≠.
locales.name: ‚ò≠: Hammer & Sickle

locales.description: Username and / or description which includes MAGA, MAHA, TRUMP, or TRUMP 2024, or posts with #MAGA and #TRUMP2024 hashtags or clear indicators of support for Trump. Also labels Trump associated figures (MTG, RFK Jr., his children, etc.)
locales.name: MAGA

locales.description: Username, handle, and / or description which includes Nazi and neo-nazi symbols, including swastikas, references to the 14 words and Hitler's initials, or double lightning bolts.
locales.name: Nazi Symbolism

locales.description: Account or post advocates for or supports racially, ethnically, or ideologically motivated extremism.
locales.name: RMVE/IMVE

locales.description: Applied to posts which contain a link to sites commonly used for sports betting, such as Draft Kings or Fan Duel. If you or a loved one have a gambling problem, please find help here: https://www.ncpgambling.org/help-treatment/help-by-state/
locales.name: Sports Betting Link

locales.description: Profile contains explicit self-description of user being a ‚ÄúTrans-Exclusionary Radical Feminist‚Äù (TERF), ‚ÄúGender Critical‚Äù (GC), or "Gender Realist".
